mapper.select: SELECT S.ISBN, S.USER_NO, S.REVIEW_DATE, S.STAR, S.REVIEW, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.STATUS FROM SCORE S LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK B ON S.ISBN = B.ISBN WHERE S.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCORE SET GOOD = GOOD+1 WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ISBN, USER_NO, REVIEW_DATE, STAR, REVIEW, GOOD FROM SCORE WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} AND GOOD = (SELECT MAX(GOOD) FROM SCORE WHERE ISBN = #{isbn})
SELECT STAR, COUNT(*) AS COUNT_STAR FROM SCORE WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} GROUP BY STAR
